analysis.description:
SPAM.fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x588f4ee97a2085c95420a45684a898d4b5906ba1.sol#200-205) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/37/0x588f4ee97a2085c95420a45684a898d4b5906ba1.sol#201-202)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x588f4ee97a2085c95420a45684a898d4b5906ba1.sol:
